sentences.english: The route and experiments for synthesis of carbazole violet are described in detail.

sentences.english: But Mr. Viniar declined to discuss in detail the impact that the new regulations would have on Goldman, saying that it was too early to give any guidance on the subject.

sentences.english: The findings are based on detailed radar measurements of ice caps on Mars.

sentences.english: In this section we will analyze the business case and problem in detail.
